author: Darren Stephenson
comment: Hasn't worked for over 3 months without a single response from the developers. Another update and it still doesn't work. I dropped out of the beta program thinking that might be the issue but that wasn't it.

author: Mark Leger
comment: Data sync is garbage and the interface looks like it's from the 90s.

author: Sean Bryden
comment: Great app when it work but recently it has started crashing a lot

author: David C Honeycutt
comment: Awesome way to track fitness

The app syncs with the belt only intermittently.  It is slow, unpredictable and unreliable.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app.  I have checked and double checked the permissions etc.  All are correct.  The MyZone belt capabilities are rendered useless because of this extremely poor app.  Please sort it out as I've paid a lot of money for a product which cannot be utilised due to the poor app it is used with.

author: Tyler Watts
comment: Installed it and followed registration and now the app won't do anything. Just shows a welcome page and all icons/buttons are unresponsive. Totally useless. Only saving grace is my gym automatically captures the data live also so I don't have to rely on the app just now. But I can't use it outside of gym... Disappointed.

author: Tam SB
comment: Frustrating to use this app as it's not uploading or logging any workouts completed away from a live tracking app. It counts my test at home sitting on my bed as a workout, but my whole footy training session is not logged? Also belt doesnt beep when connected, and cut out halfway through a session (Samsung S8). Should also have the ability to delete workouts.

The latest version is rubbish, it doesn't record a continuous exercise session, freezes all the time so you can't track your heart rate, doesn't track a full session, and often won't connect to the heart rate monitor. I hope they return to the last version of the app which was better. I'm trying to use it to follow a training plan but it's currently unusable  myzone please fix it!

author: Dan Williams
comment: Wish I could give it two scores: one star (frequent fails, buggy, connection problems); 4 stars (works great, but some useless features).

author: Don MaGee
comment: Why did you get rid of the calories if your percentage is lower than 50%? As a Police Officer my day consists of walking and driving. That's how I burn most of my calories during the day. None of which I exert more than 50%. I don't even wear it anymore because of the new update. I'll just go back to my other fitness tracker.

author: Mary Bailey
comment: I enjoy the new Zone Match feature but everytime i finish a match it compares my score to "Quick Blast" instead of whatever else ive chosen. Ive tried both the mini blipinator and mini hillinator and i have to go back to the zone match selection page to see how i did.

author: Meaghan Alves
comment: Doesn't pair with my Samsung Galaxy s7. Works in the gym on the screen but will not connect to the app. Emailed support and they confirmed it won't work with my Android. Wish they said that somewhere before I bought it!

author: stephen kostric
comment: My gym buddies and I all have one. Makes training a little more interesting and enjoyable. Interesting to see how much effort is being made by everyone.

author: John Fowler
comment: Doesn't connect to belt after latest update. Useless.

author: Juston Ling
comment: App broke with the latest update. Fix it

author: MARTIN HOPTON
comment: Needs bug fix after update. Can't upload  data.

author: Jo Lim
comment: Bugs in the app. It will have errors occasionally and whole app will hv to be closed. Idea is great as it helps you keep to your scores and allows you to see who is at where with their training and keeping up with your contacts.

author: Natasha Falls
comment: The app doesn't always connect to my monitor, takes a long time sometimes to update my workouts, and the app crashes on me all the time.

author: Katelynn Sarna
comment: Ever since the new update, nothing uploads. The new update made the app garbage

author: Russell Richards
comment: Doesn't work consistently....

author: Monique Goodman
comment: This app and device worked really well when I had an iPhone, but since I've had my android it doesn't download my workouts without having to manipulate it. Please fix This, it's  annoying.

author: Mary Wolford
comment: I have a samsung phone and this app is always screwing up and not logging my workouts correctly. When it works, it is fantastic. I just hate having to continously contact tech support about my workouts not showing up. It's a bother.

author: Alex Scholey
comment: I've downloaded this app twice as its used by my gym, and all I can do is scroll the main page. Drop downs dont work, picture button doesnt work, little plus symbol doesnt work, literally just scrolls up and down. Thats it. Thats all it does. No help at all. I get more help online with the web version.

author: Catalina Reyes
comment: This app and the device stinks. The application just has no features that make sense. It is simple but hard to navigate. It is not fumctional. The Myzone doesnt connect to the application on my phone. I would never recommend this product except for my gym supports it.

I recently got the Note 8, and the Myzone app has not been working correctly.  It's doubling and tripling my meps in the app, but the unit is accurately capturing them.  But when I'm watching the app, it's hard to know where I really am at for meps.  I've uninstalled the app 4 times now, and still not getting accurate readout of meps, until it uploads my workout.  Other than this issue, it's a decent app.  If you have the myzone belt, you really have no other option. I think the app is not that user friendly, and I've been using for 10 months now!  It's just set up kind of awkward, where it opens up at, and when you hit back once, it asks if you really want to close.  Oh and even though I have set my app up to not ask for pictures, and every single time I click DO NOT ASK AGAIN, it still asks me after every workout.  Kind of annoying!

author: C S
comment: I love the idea of this application (as my gym uses live MyZone on its TV screens) but the application itself doesn't actually let me click anything, unless I click several times and even then it may not work. Overall the absolute worst app on my phone and would NOT recommend anyone download it.

author: Kelli Barber
comment: Works great in the gym as long as the community screen is working,  but the functions on my app won't respond and allow me to see my workout in progress on my android phone.  So frustrating.

author: JuRiel W.
comment: App was great before the update. Now, I'm unable to view any workouts performed after 11/29 and "calendar" and "mystats" are blank. I hope they fix this soon.

author: juliann larimer
comment: Update: Still the worst app I have on my phone. Recent Android upgrade means you have to have  GPS turned on in order for your phone to connect with your band. So intrusive. I now only use it at my gym. Tried to get help from tech support and they were useless. Again, if you have a choice - steer clear from this garbage app.

author: Brian Conn
comment: App was great until recently now it only opens in home page will not open calender to see workouts. Cannot see monthly  status etc. When will this be fixed

author: June Jerseyshore
comment: have used MyZone for over a year.  All of a sudden it now will not sync with my phone.  Going to have to abandon it = it I can solve the problem and their support is not good at all.
It seem to work on android.  The buttons don't work when pressed and it doesn't connect to the MZ3 belt.  It works on my IPad but not on a Samsung phone.

author: Annie Guillaume
comment: Won't pick up my belt on my Android since the update, even though the phone can see the belt on bluetooth

author: Cruise Bay
comment: Account got deleted after almost reaching Silver status. Efforts Reset rather than Rewarded, should get the slogan changed.

author: Mandy Kent
comment: The app is unresponsive. I'm using an android phone and have tried uninstalling/reinstalling. Very frustrating.

author: Dominik Rozman
comment: I have a Samsung s7 and I can't do anything with the app other than scroll through past workouts on main feed. Also, when I try to pair it to my phone through Bluetooth it always gets rejected.
With the new update on Pixel.2xl I am unable to connect any longer.

author: Liza Ronzello
comment: The app is constantly frozen. I cannot access the workout information anywhere else. Seems totally dysfunctional
This app doesn't work on my Pixel 2, I can open it but not navigate it. Very unhappy.

author: Mark Freeman
comment: The app is useless.  I am a samsung android and I will be returning the belt and monitor back for a refund.
